SELECT CASE WHEN AccountCode = 'Total' THEN 'Total' ELSE AccountCode END AS "AccountCode" , Cnt AS "Cnt" , Amount AS "Amount" , AccountName AS "AccountName" FROM ( SELECT NVL(A.AccountCode, 'Total') AccountCode , COUNT(*) Cnt , SUM(Amount) Amount , MAX(AccountName) AccountName FROM ( SELECT ProofCode, 1 , AEAD.Amount AS Amount
, AEAD.StandardBriefID AccountCode, AEAD.StandardBriefName AccountName
, AEAD.AccountCode AccountCode, AEAD.AccountName AccountName
FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE #{payDate}||'%'
AND AEAD.CostCenterCode = #{deptCode}
AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code}
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE '%;' || #{stdCode} || ';%' )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' ) A GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.AccountCode) ) AA ORDER BY Amount DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JWF_Process A INNER JOIN JWF_Workitem B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_Performer C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = #{state} AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL

SELECT A.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , B.WorkItemID AS "WorkItemID" , C.PerformerID AS "PerformerID" , A.InitiatorID AS "InitiatorID" , A.InitiatorName AS "InitiatorName" , A.InitiatorUnitID AS "InitiatorUnitID" , A.InitiatorUnitName AS "InitiatorUnitName" , C.UserCode AS "UserCode" , C.UserName AS "UserName" , C.SubKind AS "SubKind" , C.SubKind AS "FormSubKind" , B.Created AS "Created" , B.TaskID AS "TaskID" , FormSubject AS "FormSubject" , TO_CHAR(B.Created, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "Created" , B.TaskID AS "TaskID" , U.PhotoPath AS "PhotoPath" , D.BusinessData1 AS "BusinessData1" , D.BusinessData2 AS "BusinessData2" FROM JWF_Process A INNER JOIN JWF_Workitem B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN JWF_Performer C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN JWF_ProcessDescription D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user U ON U.UserCode = A.InitiatorID WHERE 1=1 AND C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND D.BusinessData1 = 'APPROVAL' AND B.State = #{state} AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY A.EndDate desc

SELECT AEA.ExpenceApplicationID AS "ExpenceApplicationID" , AEA.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode" , AEA.ApplicationTitle AS "ApplicationTitle" , AEA.ApplicationType AS "ApplicationType" , AEA.ApplicationStatus AS "ApplicationStatus" , AEA.RegisterID AS "RegisterID" , USR.DisplayName AS "RegisterName" , AEA.ProcessID AS "ProcessID" , TO_CHAR(NVL(AEA.ApplicationDate, AEA.RegistDate), 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "ApplicationDate" , AEA.RequestType AS "RequestType" , AEA.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , AEA.ChargeJob AS "ChargeJob" , AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID AS "ExpenceApplicationListID" , AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID AS "cdRownum" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AEAL.ProofDate), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "ProofDate" , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AEAL.PostingDate), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "PostingDate" , AEAL.ProofCode AS "ProofCode" , AEAL.CardUID AS "CardUID" , AEAL.CashUID AS "CashUID" , AEAL.TaxUID AS "TaxUID" , AEAL.TaxType AS "TaxType" , AEAL.TaxCode AS "TaxCode" , AEAL.PayAdjustMethod AS "PayAdjustMethod" , AEAL.PayMethod AS "PayMethod" , AEAL.IsWithholdingTax AS "IsWithholdingTax" , AEAL.IncomeTax AS "IncomeTax" , AEAL.LocalTax AS "LocalTax" , AEAL.PayDate AS "PayDate" , AEAL.VendorNo AS "VendorNo" , AEAL.TotalAmount AS "TotalAmount" , AEAD.Amount AS "Amount" , AEAD.AccountCode AS "AccountCode" , C.AccountName AS "AccountName" FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN act_account C ON AEAD.AccountCode = c.AccountCode LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user USR ON AEA.RegisterID = USR.UserCode WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE #{payDate} || '%' AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' AND AEAL.ProofCode = #{proofCode} AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT AR.ReceiptID AS "ReceiptID", AR.CompanyCode AS "CompanyCode", AR.ExpenceMgmtCode AS "ExpenceMgmtCode", AR.UsageText AS "UsageText", AR.PhotoDate AS "PhotoDate", AR.PhotoDate AS "PhotoDateStr", AR.ReceiptType AS "ReceiptType", AR.ReceiptFileID AS "ReceiptFileID", AR.Active AS "Active", FN_GETACTBASECODENAME('Active', AR.Active, 'ALL') AS "ActiveName", AR.RegisterID AS "RegisterID", TO_CHAR( AR.RegistDate, 'MM.DD HH24.MI' ) AS "RegistDateMDHM", TO_CHAR( AR.RegistDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD' ) AS "RegistDate", REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode)||SF.FilePath || SF.SavedName AS "URLPath", AR.AccountCode AS "AccountCode", C.AccountName AS "AccountName", TotalAmount AS "TotalAmount", ( SELECT StandardBriefName FROM act_standard_brief SB WHERE SB.StandardBriefID = AR.StandardBriefID ) AS "StandardBriefName" FROM act_receipt AR LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_file SF ON AR.ReceiptFileID = SF.FileID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID LEFT OUTER JOIN act_account C ON AR.AccountCode = C.AccountCode WHERE AR.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY AR.ReceiptID DESC

WITH DATA AS ( SELECT SUM(Amount) AS AmountSum
,AEAD.StandardBriefID Code, AEAD.StandardBriefName Name
,AEAD.AccountCode Code, AEAD.AccountName Name
FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE #{payYear} || '%'
AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code}
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE '%;' || #{stdCode} || ';%' )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' GROUP BY
AEAD.StandardBriefID, AEAD.StandardBriefName
AEAD.AccountCode, AEAD.AccountName
ORDER BY SUM(Amount) desc ) SELECT AmountSum AS "AmountSum" , Code AS "Code" , Name AS "Name" FROM DATA WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT '' AS "DeptCode", '전체' AS "DeptName" FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT ACC.CostCenterCode AS "DeptCode", ACC.CostCenterName AS "DeptName" FROM act_cost_center ACC JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT AEAD.CostCenterCode FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE #{payDate} || '%'
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE '%;' || #{stdCode} || ';%' )
) A ON ACC.CostCenterCode = A.CostCenterCode

SELECT '' AS "AccountCode", '전체' AS "AccountName" FROM DUAL
UNION ALL
SELECT
A.StandardBriefID AS "AccountCode", SB.StandardBriefName AS "AccountName"
A.AccountCode AS "AccountCode", C.AccountName AS "AccountName"
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AEAD.AccountCode , AEAD.StandardBriefID FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE #{payDate} || '%'
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE '%;' || #{stdCode} || ';%' )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' ) A JOIN act_account C ON C.AccountCode = A.AccountCode
JOIN act_standard_brief SB ON C.AccountID = SB.AccountID AND A.StandardBriefID = SB.StandardBriefID
WHERE C.IsUse = 'Y'
SELECT deptCode AS "UserCode" , deptName AS "DisplayName" , 'dept' AS "type" FROM sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE UserCode = #{UR_Code}

SELECT AD.AuditID AS "AuditID" , AD.RuleCode AS "RuleCode" , AD.StdDescription AS "StdDescription" FROM act_audit AD WHERE AD.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND IsUse = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY AuditID DESC

SELECT CD.Code AS "Code" , CD.CodeName AS "CodeName" , CD.Reserved1 AS "Reserved1" , CD.Reserved2 AS "Reserved2" FROM act_base_code CD WHERE CD.CodeGroup = 'budgetStd' AND CODE != 'budgetStd' AND IsUse = 'Y'
AND CD.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND CD.CompanyCode IN ('ALL', #{companyCode})
AND ROWNUM <= 1 ORDER BY CASE WHEN CD.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END

SELECT a.VendorNo AS "VendorNo" , (Select FormName from act_expence_forms AEF WHERE a.RequestType = AEF.FormCode and AEF.CompanyCode = a.CompanyCode) AS "RequestTypeName" , bgroup.DeptName AS "DeptName" , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, usr.MultiDisplayName) AS "UserName" , TRUNC(a.RealPayAmount) AS "RealPayAmount" , VD.BankName AS "BankName" , VD.BankAccountNo AS "BankAccountNo" , VD.BankAccountName AS "BankAccountName" FROM ( SELECT AEA.Sub_UR_Code AS VendorNo, AEA.RequestType, AEA.CompanyCode , SUM(CASE WHEN AEAL.RealPayAmount IS NULL THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN (AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND SUM(AEAD.Amount) != AEAL.TotalAmount) THEN SUM(AEAD.Amount) + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE SUM(AEAD.Amount) END FROM act_expence_application_div AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID ) ELSE AEAL.RealPayAmount END) AS RealPayAmount FROM act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID -- 일반, 프로젝트, 접대비, 출장 WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID IN #{item} GROUP BY AEA.Sub_UR_Code, AEA.RequestType, AEA.CompanyCode ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT VD.VendorID, MAX(VD.VendorNo) AS VendorNo, MIN(VDB.BankID) AS BankID, MAX(VD.VendorName) AS VendorName, MAX(VDB.BankName) AS BankName , MAX(VDB.BankAccountNo) AS BankAccountNo , MAX(VDB.BankAccountName) AS BankAccountName FROM act_vendor_bank VDB JOIN act_vendor VD ON VD.VendorID = VDB.VendorID AND VD.VendorType = 'OR' -- 임직원 거래처 Type GROUP BY VD.VendorID ) VD ON VD.VendorNo = a.VendorNo LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user usr ON usr.UserCode = a.VendorNo LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup bgroup ON bgroup.UserCode = usr.UserCode AND bgroup.JobType = 'Origin' ORDER BY deptname, username

SELECT MAX(A.VendorName) AS "VendorName", TRUNC(SUM(A.RealPayAmount)) AS "RealPayAmount", MAX(A.BankName) AS "BankName", MAX(A.BankAccountNo) AS "BankAccountNo", MAX(A.BankAccountName) AS "BankAccountName" FROM ( SELECT AEA.ExpenceApplicationID, AEA.RegisterID, AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID, CASE WHEN AEAL.PayMethod IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AEAL.ProofCode = 'CorpCard' THEN 'D' ELSE 'C' END ELSE AEAL.PayMethod END AS PayMethod, CASE WHEN AEAL.RealPayAmount IS NULL THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN ( AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND SUM(AEAD.Amount) != AEAL.TotalAmount ) THEN SUM(AEAD.Amount) + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE SUM(AEAD.Amount) END FROM ACT_EXPENCE_APPLICATION_DIV AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID ) ELSE AEAL.RealPayAmount END AS RealPayAmount, NVL(AEAL.VendorNo, AEA.RegisterID) AS VendorNo, NVL(NVL(VD.VendorName, ATI.InvoicerCorpName), AEAL.VendorName) AS VendorName, ( SELECT StandardBriefID FROM ACT_EXPENCE_APPLICATION_DIV AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS StandardBriefID , VD.BankName , VD.BankAccountNo , VD.BankAccountName FROM ACT_EXPENCE_APPLICATION AEA INNER JOIN ACT_EXPENCE_APPLICATION_LIST AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN ACT_EXPENCE_FORMS AEF ON AEA.RequestType = AEF.FormCode and AEF.CompanyCode = AEA.CompanyCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ACT_TAXINVOICE ATI ON AEAL.TaxUID = ATI.TaxInvoiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT VD.VendorID, MAX(VD.VendorNo) AS VendorNo, MIN(VDB.BankID) AS BankID, MAX(VD.VendorName) AS VendorName, MAX(VDB.BankName) AS BankName , MAX(VDB.BankAccountNo) AS BankAccountNo , MAX(VDB.BankAccountName) AS BankAccountName FROM ACT_VENDOR_BANK VDB JOIN ACT_VENDOR VD ON VD.VendorID = VDB.VendorID AND VD.VendorType != 'OR' GROUP BY VD.VendorID ) VD ON VD.VendorNo = AEAL.VendorNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND AEF.MenuType = 'V' AND AEA.RequestType IN ('VENDOR') AND AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID IN #{item} ) A WHERE PayMethod = 'C' GROUP BY A.ExpenceApplicationID, A.RegisterID, A.PayMethod, A.VendorNo, A.StandardBriefID
